title: Your shop - MattBVC12
body: Wanted to get my Chamopinship Zed only to find out when i re-opened shop it was replaced championship thresh.... is there any way i can get my ENTIRE old shop back bcs i was literally thinking of buying all of them now half of them have changed.. thanks :)

replies.body: Yeah!  Reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and let us know which items you wanted exactly.  Make sure you have enough RP on the account!
Thanks a lot, i appreciate it :)
